title: Systax error at importing a package
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
I get a syntax error at using a determined import

$ goinstall github.com/kless/Go-Inline/quest
question.go:17: syntax error: unexpected <, expecting semicolon or
newline or }

https://github.com/kless/Go-Inline/blob/master/quest/question.go#L17 

It can be reproduced in the last weekly:
--
package main

import "github.com/kless/Go-Inline/inline"

func main() { }
--

main.go:3: syntax error: unexpected <, expecting semicolon or newline or }

===

Note that I'm using another imports with the preffix "Go-" in the package name
and there is no problem with them.
